    <footnotes>
        <footnote id="F1">Represents full vesting of shares earned under a performance stock award granted in September 2022 under the Microsoft Corporation Executive Incentive Plan for the 3-year performance period that ended on June 30, 2025.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F2">This transaction was executed in multiple trades at prices ranging from $502.390 to $503.380. The price reported above reflects the weighted average purchase price.
